extendedInfo.description: ***Please report to luigi.papino@gmail.com any problem ******Please, add smartphone model and rom in problem report***Are you a Magician, a Druid or a Summoner (or similar) in PFRPG? STOP with handbook consultation while using "summon Monster" or "summon Nature's Ally" spells!This application will allow you to use those spells (Based on OGL terms) WITHOUT handbooks. ALL you need is here, and it do not needs internet connection!This Application will help you managing summoned monsters.You will have a complete sheet for those monster, and you will be able to interact with her! Search on Youtube for more information! This Lite version will provide you all monsters of first level and first monster of all levels of summon monster/summon nature's ally. Download full version for ALL monsters.PFRPG stands for PF Role Playing Game, the fantasy RPG by Paizo Publishing.Features:* Augment Summoning* Celestial and Fiendish* Manage up to 5 creatures at time* Ac, touch, flat-footed* Spell Resistance, Damage resistance* Fortitude, Reflex, Will* Combat maneuver bonus (CMB), combat maneuver defense (CMD)* Hit dice, Bonus Attack Base, Hit points* Alignment, subtype* Ability Scores* Attacks and roll attack and damage, Special Attack* Spells, Skills, Feats, Special Qualities, Defensive Abilities, Senses, Speed*** This app collect anonymous statistic on utilization.Changelog 1.6.5****************************************Please, if you still have problems, contact me at luigi.papino@gmail.com.I can't reproduce this issue.*****************************************â¢Database Bugfix. Changelog 1.6.4â¢ Advertising removedâ¢ Cleanup of codeâ¢ minor bugfixChangelog 1.6.2â¢ Added support for report database errorâ¢ Added Google Analytics â¢ Minor bugfixChangelog 1.6.1â¢ Various Bugfixâ¢ Maybe, Database exception resolved :)â¢ Changelog 1.6.0â¢ New Theme, more readableâ¢ Now manage Critical Hitâ¢ Added Round counterâ¢ Added An option to set the number of summoned monstersâ¢  Added the details on Smite Evil/Good (attack bonus and damage bonus) under other details on the attackâ¢ Various BugfixChangelog 1.5.3*Various bugfix and adjustment.Changelog 1.5.2*Added BAB* HP BugfixChangelog 1.5.0* New Interface more comfortable for Tablet/Honeycomb* New Interface for smartphone* Added HD * Move to SD Card* Various BugFix* Code Clean upChangelog 1.2.0* Now report HD and Cha bonus in Smite Evil/Good* Size installation ReducedChangelog 1.1.1*Critical bugfix (proguard)Changelog 1.1.0* Fixed Stirge* Add LVL to Reduce App size* Improved Support for HoneyCombChangelog 1.0.6* Fixed fortitude, now change in according to Augment Summoning* Fixed More Activity* Fixed Bulette crash;ChangeLog 1.0.5* Fixed Electric Eel and Mite crash;* Fixed template issue* Now DC constitution-based, like poison, change in according to Augment summoning* Now cmd bonus and cmb bonus changes in according to Augment Summoning* Now bonus damage like "1d6 cold bonus" in ice devil is considered in Roll Attack.* Improved UI*Tags: d20,rpg,wizard,bard,cleric,sorcer,druid,ranger,spell,summon,monster,nature's ally,pfrpg,augment summoning, celestial, fiendish,prd,pfsrd,dungeons, dragons, dnd

reviews.title: Deceit
reviews.comment: Might want to double check the \"only below level 3\" restriction. Level 2 is below level 3 in most math books, not in this app though. No sense in getting paid edition, not enough info or use.
reviews.author: Felipe Caama\303\261o

reviews.title: Not up to date
reviews.comment: Claims to be for pathfinder but does not include changes to the PF Summon Monster I list made a year ago. Author needs to keep up to date with errata.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I don\'t like the sheet layout
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Cannot use for summon monster ii even though it says creatures available up to lvl 3. Why bother to offer a free app at all? Might as well just be pay
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Has promise, but not quite there.
reviews.comment: I tried it and liked it a lot for what it was. The downside is this is billed as being useful for a \"d20 based RPG\". The problem is that I was not able to figure out how to change or customize the list. I understand why it may be incomplete based on potential OGL restrictions, but not being able to fix the deficiency by customizing is not useful. For instance the lists do not have Giant Eagle available under Summon Nature Ally III nor Hippogriff as Level II, etc. I may retry again after updates.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Is this a joke?
reviews.comment: List of beasts to summon and when I click on one it just gives me stats. Where/what/how do you play the game? Worst app ever. Would give 0 if I could
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good app would better if it had a way to show creatures summoned with the augment summoning feat. Also could have resolute and entropic templates.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Excellent app, exactly what I was looking for. Glad it was imported to android. Running this on rooted nook, and it looks great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Holy crap! This is *awesome*!!! If you play 3.5 D&D caster - GET IT!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What is this?
reviews.comment: I have downloaded this \"game\" twice and both time I habe failed to understand the point of it. There appear to be no graphics, just some poorly designed menu. I just.. I don\'t even ..yea...  Why would someone take the time to program something this?
reviews.author: Bradley Dabdoub
